verses.verse: <S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H802><s%> 'If a woman <S%H2232>conceives,<s%> and <S%H3205>bears<s%> a male <S%H2145>child,<s%> then she shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H5079>monthly<s%> <S%H1738>period<s%> she shall be <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>
In the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> shall be <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

She shall <S%H3427>continue<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H2893>purification<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%>- <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%> She shall not <S%H5060>touch<s%> any <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H935>thing,<s%> nor come into the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> until the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H2892>purifying<s%> are <S%H4390>completed.<s%>

But if she <S%H3205>bears<s%> a female <S%H5347>child,<s%> then she shall be <S%H2930>unclean<s%> two <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> as in her <S%H5079>period;<s%> and she shall <S%H3427>continue<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H2893>purification<s%> <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

<S%H3117><s%>"'When the days of her <S%H2892>purification<s%> are <S%H4390>completed,<s%> for a <S%H1121>son,<s%> or for a <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> she shall <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old <S%H3532>lamb<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeon,<s%> or a <S%H8449>turtledove,<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering:<s%>

and he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H2891>her;<s%> and she shall be cleansed from the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood.<s%> <S%H8451><s%>"'This is the law for her who <S%H3205>bears,<s%> whether a <S%H2145>male<s%> or a <S%H5347>female.<s%>

If she cannot afford <S%H1767>a<s%> <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> then she shall take <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves,<s%> or <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons;<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> for a sin <S%H5930>offering:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H2891>her,<s%> and she shall be clean.'"
